name: Rigged (itch) (SocialMeteorite)
description:
This game was made in 48h for the United Game Jam 2020, with the theme: two.

The game takes place in rigged race where you're supposed to end up 2nd. This is where the theme is used.

Regarding my level, I am not a total beginner as I already participated in another jam before. That said, I am not expert neither.

Everything was made by me, except the font.

The pixel font by TinyWorlds, Thaleah, which has a CC-BY 3.0 license and is available here, was used in this project.

The game is quite simple, and not much interesting, but it's the only OK idea I found, so I'll try to improve next time.

Tools used

  • Godot as the game engine
  • Bfxr for the sfx
  • Aseprite for the visuals
